ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and at once they will be on the surface, wide awake!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they will wake up suddenly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and lo, they will all be in the open plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: to bring them out of their graves and back to life on the earth's surface.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they will immediately be in an open plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When behold, they are at As-Sahirah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When lo! they shall be wakeful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! they will be awakened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and behold! They will all come out in the open.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And lo! they all shall appear on the surface.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and behold, they will be awake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When, behold, they will be in the (full) awakening (to Judgment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When, behold, they find themselves over the earth alive after their death,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they will be upon the surface of the earth (alive).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:14] behold, then, they, all creatures, will be upon the surface of the earth, alive, after having been dead inside it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! they will be awakened) on the face of the earth; and it is also said: in the land of the gathering.
